mapper.select: SELECT `id`, `settlement_id`, `ingredient_id`, `stock_in_quantity`, `stock_out_quantity`, `income_on_quantity`, `loss_on_quantity`, `real_quantity`, `total_quantity`, `created_time`, `last_modified_time` FROM t_storage_settlement_ingredient WHERE `settlement_id` = #{settlementId} ORDER BY `created_time` DESC

SELECT * FROM t_storage_settlement_item WHERE t_storage_settlement_item.`settlement_id`= ( SELECT id FROM t_storage_settlement WHERE t_storage_settlement.`created_time`<#{settlementDate} ORDER BY t_storage_settlement.`created_time` DESC LIMIT 1 )

SELECT `id`,`item_id`,`stock_in_quantity`,`stock_in_money`,`stock_out_quantity`, `stock_out_money`,`income_on_quantity`,`income_on_money`,`loss_on_quantity`, `loss_on_money`,`real_quantity`,`real_money`,`total_quantity`,`total_money`, `settlement_id`,`created_time`,`last_modified_time` FROM t_storage_settlement_item WHERE t_storage_settlement_item.`settlement_id`= ( SELECT id FROM t_storage_settlement WHERE t_storage_settlement.`created_time`<#{settlementDate} ORDER BY t_storage_settlement.`created_time` DESC LIMIT 1 ) AND t_storage_settlement_item.item_id=#{itemId}
SELECT `id`,`serial_number`,`created_time`,`last_modified_time` FROM `t_storage_settlement` WHERE `created_time`<=#{settlementDate} ORDER BY `created_time` DESC LIMIT 1
